GSD.description:
eventfd: provide a eventfd_signal_mask() helper

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit 4a403dfa501ce453e5fbb44b9aa7e935d42a831e. For more details please see the references link.
